source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000010_HANCOCK<tab>My friends! Thank you for coming at such short notice!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000010_HANCOCK<tab>オォ～、よくぞおいでくださいました～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000020_ALISAIE<tab>We were told the matter was urgent. I take it Yugiri and Soroban are also involved?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000020_ALISAIEずいぶんな慌てようだけど、どうしたって言うの？
それに、ユウギリとソロバンまで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000030_SOROBAN<tab>Ah, my presence here is but a happy coincidence. I am come on separate business─which can wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000030_SOROBANええっと、オイラは呼ばれて来たんじゃないんだよねぇ～。
別件の用事があるんだけど、今のところ急ぎってわけでもないし、
オイラからの話は、後回しでいいよぉ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000040_YUGIRI<tab>My apologies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000040_YUGIRI<tab>かたじけない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000050_YUGIRI<tab>Master Hancock─pray tell our friends exactly what you told me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000050_YUGIRIハンコック殿……
例の話を、彼らにお聞かせ願えるか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000060_HANCOCK<tab>Of course, of course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000060_HANCOCKもちろんデ～ス！
話は、さかのぼること数日前……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000070_HANCOCK<tab>Some few days ago, a large detachment of soldiers was seen arriving at the Garlean embassy. This seemed to me most unusual, as no personages of note are due to visit for a matter of months.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000070_HANCOCK帝国大使館に、かなりの数の兵士がやってきました。
私の知るかぎり、要人訪問の予定もないのに、
これは極めて異例なことデス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000080_HANCOCK<tab>So I made a few inquiries, whereupon I learned of a most curious rumor.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000080_HANCOCKそこで、オトモダチにあれこれ聞き回ったところ、
実に興味深い話がでてきたのデ～ス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000090_HANCOCK<tab>Apparently, the soldiers were dispatched to Kugane to investigate recent sightings of a certain individual.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000090_HANCOCKなんと帝国兵たちは、クガネで目撃された、
ある人物を捜すために派遣されてきたのだとか……。
聞いて驚くなかれ、その人物とは…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000100_HANCOCK<tab>The late acting imperial viceroy of Doma─Yotsuyu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000100_HANCOCK<tab>ドマ代理総督ヨツユ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>I beg your pardon!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000110_ALPHINAUD<tab>な、なんだって！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000120_YUGIRI<tab>I, too, am loath to believe it. I saw the keep come down on top of her.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000120_YUGIRI……にわかには信じがたいと、私も思う。
ヒエン様がヨツユを斬り伏せるところを、
この目でしかと見たのだからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000130_YUGIRI<tab>We all did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000130_YUGIRI<tab>……そうであろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000140_HANCOCK<tab>I would not presume to question your eyewitness accounts, nor am I one to take rumors at face value. The fact is, the Garleans have no knowledge of what took place at Doma Castle─they may well be chasing after a woman who merely resembles Yotsuyu.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000140_HANCOCK私としても、頭から信じてるワケではありませんヨ。
帝国軍は、ドマ城天守閣での出来事を知らないはずですし、
他人のそら似に惑わされている可能性だって、大いにあり得る。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000150_HANCOCK<tab>But a woman who resembles Yotsuyu in the company of a grizzled Roegadyn samurai? I daresay that thickens the plot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000150_HANCOCKただし、話題のヨツユらしき人物が、
年老いたルガディン族の侍に連れられていたとしたらどうデス？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000160_ALISAIE<tab>...Gosetsu? He's alive!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000160_ALISAIE<tab>まさか……ゴウセツってこと！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000170_HANCOCK<tab>While I've no conclusive proof, I thought that such a possibility warranted your attention.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000170_HANCOCK確証はありませんが、気にはなる情報でしょう？
デスからこうして、みなさんにお集まりいただいたのデス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000180_ALISAIE<tab>Have you informed Lord Hien?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000180_ALISAIE<tab>……その話、ヒエンにはしたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000190_ALISAIE<tab>Well, I think we'd all like to believe the old bear survived.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000190_ALISAIEまぁ……そうよね。
あの頑丈なゴウセツならって、思いたいところではあるけど。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000200_YUGIRI<tab>Indeed. While I dare not give myself wholly to hope, I will not deny that I have prayed for such a miracle ever since that fateful day.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000200_YUGIRIああ……。
根拠のない楽観論にすがりたくはないが、
生きていてくれと、そう祈り続けてきたのも事実……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000210_YUGIRI<tab>But regardless of my personal feelings, if the Empire has seen fit to pursue these rumors so vigorously, we can scarce afford to ignore them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000210_YUGIRI何より、帝国軍が本腰を上げて捜索しているのなら、
こちらとしても、手をこまねいているわけにはいくまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000220_YUGIRI<tab>I am bound by duty to ascertain the truth of the matter. Will you join me in this quest?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000220_YUGIRI私は、事の真偽を確かめるためにも、
探りを入れてみるつもりだが、貴殿らはどうする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Aye. We'll find Gosetsu together.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>ゴウセツを捜さなければ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I...am not sure what I'd do if I saw Yotsuyu again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>ヨツユを助けたくはない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000230_YUGIRI<tab>Thank you. If Gosetsu yet lives, he will need our help if he is to avoid capture.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000230_YUGIRI助かる……。
もし仮に生きているのだとすれば、
帝国兵に追われて難儀しているかもしれぬからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000240_YUGIRI<tab>I understand. Only too well. But if Gosetsu yet lives, he will need our help if he is to avoid capture.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000240_YUGIRIその気持ちは私とて同じ……。
あくまでもゴウセツが生きているのだとしたら、
帝国兵の手から守りたいというだけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000250_ALPHINAUD<tab>Gosetsu is a dear friend, and we cannot abandon him to the mercy of the Empire. Our course is clear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000250_ALPHINAUDゴウセツ殿は、大切な仲間……
再会の可能性があるというのに放ってはおけない。
我々も、協力しようじゃないか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Hancock, is there aught else you can tell us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000260_ALPHINAUD<tab>ところでハンコック殿、肝心のふたりの行方は？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000270_HANCOCK<tab>Alas not─but I have taken the liberty of employing one of the finest informants money can buy. You shall have the latest intelligence on the Garleans' movements and more besides.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000270_HANCOCK気になるかと思い、優秀な情報屋を雇っておきました。
帝国軍の動きを含めて、最新の情報を仕入れるのデ～ス！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000280_ALPHINAUD<tab>Right. I suggest we begin by learning what we can from the sentries.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000280_ALPHINAUDよし、まずは台場を守る防人たちから、
情報を集めるとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>What's going on out there!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000290_ALPHINAUD<tab>いったい何が！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000300_IKARUGA<tab>Travelers, are you? You may wish to postpone your plans. The Garleans have launched an attack on the Confederacy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000300_IKARUGA旅人か？
こんなときに居合わせるとは、運がないな。
帝国軍の飛空艇がやって来て、海賊衆の根城を襲い始めたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000310_IKARUGA<tab>We have no reason to believe they'll turn their attention here, but for your own safety I suggest you return to Kugane.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000310_IKARUGA今のところ、こちらに仕掛けてくる様子はないが……
巻き込まれたくなければ、クガネに引き返すことだな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000320_YUGIRI<tab>The Garleans bear no love for the Confederacy, but with Doma lost to them, why would they attack? Unless...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000320_YUGIRIいかに海賊衆が帝国と対立したといっても、
ドマを手放した現状で、攻撃を行わねばならない理由はない。
わざわざ、奇襲をかけるからには……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Unless Yotsuyu is on that island.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000330_ALPHINAUD<tab>あの島に帝国軍が追うヨツユがいると？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000340_ALISAIE<tab>Even if she isn't, our allies are under attack, and they need our help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000340_ALISAIEどうあれ、海賊衆はいっしょに戦った仲間よ。
黙って見てる手はないわ。
加勢に向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000350_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>We<var 1A 01 /var> will help them, while <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> remain with Soroban. Arguing will only delay us. Is that clear?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000350_ALPHINAUD待ってくれ、静観できないという点には同意するが、
アリゼーはソロバンとともに、船で待機するんだ。
議論しているヒマはない……いいね！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000360_ALISAIE<tab>Fine. But you haven't heard the last of this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000360_ALISAIEあぁ、もう！
わかったわよ、文句は後で言わせてもらうからね！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000370_ALPHINAUD<tab>Soroban─we may need to make a swift exit. See that the boat is ready to sail at a moment's notice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000370_ALPHINAUDソロバン！
君は、脱出のためいつでも船を出せるようにしておいてくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000380_SOROBAN<tab>It shall be done!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000380_SOROBAN<tab>がってん、承知ぃ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000390_ALISAIE<tab>What, and you're going to <var 1A 02 /var>swim<var 1A 01 /var> there, are you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000390_ALISAIEちょっと、アルフィノ！？
まさか泳いでいくつもり……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000400_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis the quickest way. And you may rest assured I've been practicing!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000400_ALPHINAUDこの距離なら泳いだ方が早い！
特訓の成果、今こそ見せてやる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000410_ALPHINAUD<tab>うおおおおおおおっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000420_YUGIRI<tab>Come!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000420_YUGIRI<tab>つづくぞ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000430_IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Lady Yotsuyu, we're here to rescue you! Please come with us!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000430_IMPERIALCENTURIONヨツユ様！
お迎えに上がりました、さぁ、お早く！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000440_GOSETSU<tab>Stay back, Tsuyu.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000440_GOSETSU<tab>下がっておれ、ツユ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000450_GOSETSU<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000450_GOSETSU<tab>ゲホッ、ゲホッ……ゴホッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000460_YOTSUYU<tab>Are you all right!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000460_YOTSUYU<tab>おじいちゃんっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000470_IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Is <var 1A 02 /var>he<var 1A 01 /var> all right?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000470_IMPERIALCENTURIONお、おじいちゃん！？
これは、いったい……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000480_YUGIRI<tab>Gosetsu!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000480_YUGIRI<tab>ゴウセツ、無事か！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000490_IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Damn it! We took too long. Change of plan─eliminate hostiles!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000490_IMPERIALCENTURIONええい、時間をかけすぎたか！
優先目標を、救出より敵勢力の掃討に切り替える……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000491_IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>All forces─attack!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000491_IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>総員、かかれッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000500_YUGIRI<tab>Gosetsu! Thank the heavens!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000500_YUGIRIよくぞ無事でいてくれた……！
ゴウセツ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000510_GOSETSU<tab>Yugiri, my friends... The kami were kind to guide your steps this way.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000510_GOSETSUユウギリ、それに英雄殿とアルフィノ殿まで……
助太刀、深く感謝いたす。
まさかおぬしらが現れようとは、なんたる天運！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000520_TANSUI<tab>It's over. The imperials are retreating. I suppose we have you to thank for that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000520_TANSUIああ、まったくだ。
来てくれて助かったぜ……。
おかげでどうにか、帝国の連中を追っ払うことができた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000530_TANSUI<tab>But they would never have come here were it not for <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>. I had a bad feeling the moment your samurai friend arrived with that woman in tow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000530_TANSUIそれにしても、ゴウセツの旦那がそいつを連れて現れたときには、
とんだ疫病神を拾ってきたもんだと思ったが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000540_GOSETSU<tab>Do not be afraid, Tsuyu. These people are my friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000540_GOSETSUツユよ、怖れずともよい。
この者らは、みな拙者の仲間でござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000550_YOTSUYU<tab>Friends?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000550_YOTSUYUそ、そうなの？
おじいちゃんの仲間……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Forgive me, but at the risk of souring the mood, I believe you owe us an explanation. You may start by telling us what happened at Doma Castle.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000560_ALPHINAUD諸手を挙げて再会を喜びたいところですが、
その様子……何やら訳ありのようですね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000570_GOSETSU<tab>Of course. I'll not begrudge you that. As you know, we were trapped inside the keep when it collapsed. But even as the roof crumbled above us, so too did the floor below.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000570_GOSETSUうむ……。
知ってのとおり、拙者たちはドマ城の崩落に巻き込まれた。
しかし、何の因果か床が抜け落ちたようでな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000580_GOSETSU<tab>We were swept out into the One River, where we would surely have drowned had a stout wooden door not chanced to float by, offering us a raft of sorts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000580_GOSETSUふたりそろって濁流に呑まれ、無二江へ流されたのでござる。
そして、幸いなことに、ドマ城の残骸が、
拙者たちを水底から救い上げた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000590_GOSETSU<tab>Exhausted, we drifted out to sea, at the mercy of the tides...which saw fit to dispense us on a desert island.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000590_GOSETSUだが、気付いたときには下流も下流、河口まで流されておってな。
そのまま海に出て潮に乗せられ、名も無き孤島へと、
漂着することになったのでござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>She was with you the entire time?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼女も……その残骸に……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000610_GOSETSU<tab>Aye. 'Twas her kimono which saved her from Hien's blade, believe it or not. Some Garlean witchcraft in the weave.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000610_GOSETSUうむ、ヨツユの着物が、帝国製の強靱な織物でなければ、
ヒエン様の一太刀で死んでおったでござろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000620_GOSETSU<tab>But it offered precious little protection against the fall. Though she survived, she awoke bereft of all her memories, and speaking like a child.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000620_GOSETSUただ、長い昏睡から目覚めたヨツユは、
すべてを忘れ、童のように成りはてておってな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000630_YUGIRI<tab>A trick, surely?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000630_YUGIRI馬鹿な……！
命ほしさの詐称やもしれぬぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000640_GOSETSU<tab>That was my first thought, aye. And I contemplated cutting her down and being done with it. Contemplated it long and hard...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000640_GOSETSU…………無論、拙者とて疑いはした。
斬るべきかと悩みもな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000650_GOSETSU<tab>Yet the kami saw fit to deliver us from certain death. 'Twas their will that we survive. Both of us. Together. And together we shall go before our master. He shall be the one to judge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000650_GOSETSUともあれ、事実、ともに生き残ったのだ。
どちらの悪運かは知らぬが、
連れ帰って主君の沙汰を仰ぐべきと思い直したのでござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000660_YUGIRI<tab>Judge <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000660_YUGIRI<tab>ヒエン様の……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000670_TANSUI<tab>She's your prisoner, old man. Do with her as you will. Call her “Tsuyu” or whatever else tickles your fancy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000670_TANSUIそいつを捕らえたのは、ゴウセツの旦那だ。
ドマの殿様に判断を仰ぐというなら、任せるさ。
ツユだ何だと呼んで、手懐けたいならそれもいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000680_GOSETSU<tab>'Twas a name given out of necessity whilst on the road. Nothing more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000680_GOSETSU……おおやけに呼べる名がなくば、道中不便であろう。
それだけの話でござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000690_TANSUI<tab>As you say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000690_TANSUI<tab>へいへい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000700_TANSUI<tab>But remember this: our people suffered much at that woman's hands. When the time comes, I trust you won't let emotion blind you to what needs to be done.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000700_TANSUIだが、こっちも代理総督サマには、
さんざ苦しめられてきたんだ……。
情にほだされて、判断を見誤ってくれるなよ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000710_GOSETSU<tab>You have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000710_GOSETSU<tab>承知つかまつった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000720_TANSUI<tab>Well, I must be going─I've an unholy mess to clean up. You should be on your way too, before the imperials decide to take another tilt. Oh...and we'll overlook the tithe this once. You're welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000720_TANSUIそれじゃ、俺は後始末をしてくる。
帆別銭はツケにしといてやるから、さっさと行きな。
帝国軍が舞い戻ってくる前によ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000730_GOSETSU<tab>My lord Hien. I am returned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000730_GOSETSU若……いささか遅くなり申したが、
ゴウセツ、只今、帰参つかまつりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000740_HIEN<tab>Save your tears for the morrow. For we who yet walk the path should not think too much on the destination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000740_HIEN涙とは、行き止まりが見えてこそ零れるもの。
道半ばであるうちは、互いに笑っていよう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000750_HIEN<tab>When the hour arrives, we shall welcome what comes with open arms.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000750_HIEN<tab>……決戦前夜にそう語ったのは、ほかでもない、わしだったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000760_HIEN<tab>And welcome it you did, even as the keep fell down around us. At that moment, in your smile, I spied a shred of hope. One which I have clung to ever since.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000760_HIENそして、崩れゆくドマ城にて、そなたは笑った。
それが答えで……希望であると、愚かにも信じておったぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000770_HIEN<tab>Gosetsu. Full glad am I to see you alive and well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000770_HIEN……ゴウセツ。
よくぞ……よくぞ、生きていてくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000780_GOSETSU<tab>We have played this scene before, have we not? Though this time our roles are reversed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000780_GOSETSUアジムステップでの再会とは、
立場が逆になり申したな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000790_HIEN<tab>That they are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000790_HIEN<tab>はは、言ってくれるわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000800_HIEN<tab>Meaning you know how I feel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000800_HIEN<tab>……だが、ゆえにこそ、この胸のうちもわかろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000801_HIEN<tab>Wholly at a loss for words. Welcome back, old friend!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000801_HIENまったく……まったく…………
よく戻ったとしか、言葉が出んわ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000810_HIEN<tab>Now then, though we rejoice at your return, it seems you have brought with you certain...complications.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000810_HIENしかしなぁ、ゴウセツ。
何やら尋常ならざる事態になっているようではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000820_HIEN<tab>Rise, my friend. Tell me everything.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000820_HIENさあ、立て。
そして、これまでのことを聞かせてくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000830_HIEN<tab>The Empire is bold indeed to send a token force to engage the Confederacy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000830_HIEN帝国軍め、堂々と紅玉海に部隊を送り込むとは、
やってくれるわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000840_YUGIRI<tab>As acting viceroy, Yotsuyu would have been privy to imperial secrets. The Garleans will not soon give up the chase.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000840_YUGIRIハッ……。
代理総督とは、多くの機密を知り得る立場……
多少の無茶をしてでも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000850_HIEN<tab>Nay. It will end with her capture...or her death.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000850_HIEN取り戻すなり、消すなりしたかった、
ということか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>Are you a friend too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000860_YOTSUYU<tab>あなた、おじいちゃんのお友達？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000870_GOSETSU<tab>She claims to have lost her memory, though I know not if she speaks true. I brought her here that you might decide her fate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000870_GOSETSU嘘か誠か、ヨツユは記憶を失っております。
いかにすべきか、若の沙汰を仰ごうと連れ帰った次第……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000880_HIEN<tab>Lost her memory, you say...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000880_HIEN<tab>記憶を……な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000890_HIEN<tab>Regardless, the people have not forgotten. Her face yet haunts their dreams. She cannot roam free. We will hold her here for a time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000890_HIENどうあれ、ドマの民にとっては圧政の顔のようなもの。
何の咎めもなく、自由にさせるわけにもいくまいよ。
しばし、烈士庵に留め置くか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000900_HIEN<tab>Place her in Jifuya's care, with the express instruction that she is not to be seen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000900_HIENたしかここの組頭は、ジフヤであったな？
奴に引き渡し、しばし人目から隠すようにと伝えよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000910_YUGIRI<tab>Yes, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000910_YUGIRI<tab>承知……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000920_YUGIRI<tab>Come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000920_YUGIRI<tab>ついてこい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000930_YOTSUYU<tab>N-No, I don't want to.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000930_YOTSUYUやだ、あなた嫌い。
だって、怖いもの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000940_YOTSUYU<tab>Don't let her take me away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000940_YOTSUYU<tab>おじいちゃんっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000950_GOSETSU<tab>It's all right, Tsuyu. I will come with you. Be a good girl and listen to Yugiri.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000950_GOSETSUツユよ、拙者もともに参るゆえ、
おとなしくユウギリの言うことを聞くでござる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000960_HIEN<tab>From a hound at his throat to a puppy at his heel...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000960_HIENかつて己が指で引き金を引き、
撃ってみせた男に寄り添い、慕ってみせるか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000961_HIEN<tab>If this is an act, it is a remarkable performance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000961_HIEN<tab>芝居ならば、大したものだが……さてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000970_JIFUYA<tab>By the kami! You're Lord Hien's─ L-Leave me! Leave me, I beg of you! Say nothing of this! I was never here!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000970_JIFUYAアンタは、ヒエン様といっしょにいた……
頼む、頼むから、見逃してくれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000980_YUGIRI<tab>There you are.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000980_YUGIRI<tab>ここにいたか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000990_JIFUYA<tab>Lady Yugiri. Lord Gosetsu. Forgive me my abrupt disappearance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_000990_JIFUYAユウギリ殿にゴウセツ殿……
すまないことをした、急に姿を消したりして……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001000_GOSETSU<tab>You have your reasons, I am sure. Will you not share them?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001000_GOSETSUいったいぜんたい、どうしたのでござる？
まずは訳を聞かせてはもらえぬか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001010_JIFUYA<tab>I was...I was her master. When she was yet a courtesan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001010_JIFUYAオレは……主だったんだ……。
妓楼の、な……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001020_GOSETSU<tab>By the kami...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001020_GOSETSU<tab>ジフヤ、おぬし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001030_JIFUYA<tab>She...worked in my establishment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001030_JIFUYA<tab>そうさ、ヨツユはオレの店で働いていたのさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001040_JIFUYA<tab>Her father was a regular client of mine. One day, quite without preamble, he offered to sell her to me. “She may be no maiden,” he said, “but she has some use left in her.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001040_JIFUYAある日、常連だった、ナエウリの旦那から相談されてな。
義娘をウチの店に売りたいというんだ……。
出戻りだが、まだ若く美しいってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001050_JIFUYA<tab>He sold her short. When I first beheld her, I was struck by her beauty. And yet, behind her eyes, there was...an emptiness. 'Twas as if she had given up on life. She seemed more a doll than a woman.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001050_JIFUYA会ってみて驚いたよ。
確かに美しかったが、何よりすべてを諦めたような、
生気の無い人形のような顔が印象的だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001060_JIFUYA<tab>It was no profession for her, but I knew she would be popular. And so it proved. Men flocked to drown themselves in that cold, bottomless gaze.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001060_JIFUYAとても客商売に向いているようには思えなかったが、
どういうわけか、その冷たい瞳に惹きつけられる客も多かった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001070_JIFUYA<tab>The rest you know. She became an imperial informant, and for her loyal service won the office of acting viceroy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001070_JIFUYAあとは、アンタ方も知ってのとおり。
帝国の間諜になって、あっという間にのし上がっていった。
気づけば、ドマの代理総督サマときたもんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001080_GOSETSU<tab>...While you came to serve the Liberation Front.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001080_GOSETSU<tab>では、おぬしが反乱軍に身を寄せたのも？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001090_JIFUYA<tab>'Tis said that the atrocities Yotsuyu committed were driven by vengeance. If so, I bear part of the blame for creating the monster she became.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001090_JIFUYAヨツユの悪逆非道な行いが、
ドマの民に対する意趣返しってんなら、オレもその原因だ。
あんな恨みの権化を生む、片棒を担いじまったんだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001100_JIFUYA<tab>Joining the Front was meant to be my atonement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001100_JIFUYA<tab>せめてもの罪滅ぼし……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001110_JIFUYA<tab>But the truth is... The truth is, I am a coward whose only thought was to escape her wrath. Then as now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001110_JIFUYAいや、取り繕えはしないな……。
今もこうして、逃げ出してきたように、
オレは怖かったんだ、ヨツユに復讐されるのが……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001120_GOSETSU<tab>...I see. Then I shall recommend that you be assigned to a new post.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001120_GOSETSU……事情はわかった。
ヒエン様には拙者から、よきように伝えておくでござる。
追って、おぬしには別の役回りが与えられよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001130_GOSETSU<tab>I trust you have no objections, Yugiri?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001130_GOSETSU<tab>ユウギリも、それでよいな？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001140_YUGIRI<tab>None. It would not do to leave Yotsuyu in his care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001140_YUGIRIこの調子では、とても重要な捕虜の管理は任せられまい。
お主の判断に任せよう、ゴウセツ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001150_JIFUYA<tab>I am in your debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001150_JIFUYA<tab>ありがてぇ……恩に着るよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001160_YUGIRI<tab>Who is it that you seek to protect, Gosetsu?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001160_YUGIRI<tab>果たして、守りたいのはどちらなのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001170_YUGIRI<tab>Idle musings. Pray pay me no mind.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001170_YUGIRI<tab>独り言だ、許されよ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001180_HIEN<tab>A smoke signal...? Thoughts, Yugiri?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001180_HIENあの煙……
どう見る、ユウギリ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001190_YUGIRI<tab>In former times, such signals were used to announce the coming of an emissary of peace─in Doma, at least. But could that truly be their intent?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001190_YUGIRIドマ古式の狼煙信号と見て、間違いないかと……。
自らを「停戦の使者」と示すものです。
ですが、本気でしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001200_HIEN<tab>Who can say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001200_HIEN<tab>さて……わからんなぁ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001210_HIEN<tab>Whatever they want, we cannot simply blast them out of the sky─not when they were so gracious as to honor one of our <var 1A 02 /var>cherished<var 1A 01 /var> traditions. I would not have it said that we Domans want for propriety.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001210_HIENともあれ、こちらの流儀で話そうという相手を、
問答無用で叩き落とすわけにもいくまい。
ドマは礼節を知らん国ではないからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001220_YUGIRI<tab>Then I shall go and reconnoiter.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001220_YUGIRI<tab>ならば、私が応じて様子を覗いましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001230_HIEN<tab>Nay, that won't be necessary. We will meet them openly.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001230_HIENそれには及ばん。
あちらの望みどおり、正々堂々、相対すとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001240_HIEN<tab>I would welcome this student of Doman history in person, whomsoever he or she may be...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001240_HIENそれに、わしは興味がある……
わざわざ古風にも、狼煙を上げてみせた相手にな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001250_YUGIRI<tab>As you wish, my lord. I shall arrange for a signal of our own to be fired in answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001250_YUGIRIハッ……出過ぎたことを申しました……。
では、受け入れる旨の狼煙を上げましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001260_ASAHI<tab>Well! That we should be received by the lord of Doma himself!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001260_ASAHI<tab>(-東方風の帝国人-)これはこれは、ドマの若君御自らお出迎えいただけるとは！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001270_HIEN<tab>I but afford an emissary of peace the courtesy he is due.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001270_HIEN停戦の使者となれば、
相応の礼節を以て応じるのが筋というもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001271_HIEN<tab>Welcome to Doma, my lord...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001271_HIEN<tab>そうだろう？　帝国の…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001280_ASAHI<tab>Ah, where are my manners? I am Asahi sas Brutus, ambassador plenipotentiary of Garlemald.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001280_ASAHI失礼いたしました。
私の名は、アサヒ・サス・ブルトゥス。
帝都より大使として派遣されてまいりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001290_YUGIRI<tab>He is heir to the Naeuri clan...and Yotsuyu's stepbrother.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001290_YUGIRI<tab>アサヒ……ナエウリ家の嫡男、ヨツユの義弟です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001300_ASAHI<tab>It seems I need not introduce myself─not in the presence of the famed Yugiri Mistwalker. Your skills as a shinobi are known far and wide, my lady.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001300_ASAHIおや、私のことをご存知とは！
さすがは音に聞こえし、霧隠の忍びさん、
諜報員としても一流でいらっしゃる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001310_ASAHI<tab>It is true─the former acting viceroy is my sister. Yet, bonds of kinship aside, we have precious little in common. As will soon become plain, I come not to sow strife, but to end it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001310_ASAHI確かに前代理総督のヨツユは、私の義姉です。
ですが、私は苛烈な圧政を敷いてきた彼女とは違う！
戦うためではなく、戦いを止めるために来たのです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001320_ASAHI<tab>I am of the Populares, a collective which represents the interests of the common man. Long have we labored to bring about reform to the Empire's provincial policy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001320_ASAHI私は、帝国の属州政策を内側から変えるため、
ここにいるマキシマら民衆派の同志たちと活動を続けてきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001330_ASAHI<tab>Happily for us, our master acknowledges the need for change. Indeed, His Radiance, Emperor Varis zos Galvus personally sanctioned this mission, granting me the authority to speak with his voice.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001330_ASAHIそして、その活動を認めてくださったヴァリス帝により、
全権大使の任を与えられ、派遣されてきたのです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001331_ASAHI<tab>To negotiate peace with Doma.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001331_ASAHI<tab>ドマと和平交渉をするためにッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001340_HIEN<tab>Well then, we have much to discuss.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001340_HIEN……あいわかった。
これ以上は、立ち話でする内容でもあるまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001350_HIEN<tab>Will you accompany me to my hall?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001350_HIEN貴殿らを客人として、我が館に招こう。
ドマ町人地まで、ご同行願いたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001360_ASAHI<tab>Gladly, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001360_ASAHI<tab>もちろん、喜んで！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001370_ASAHI<tab>On behalf of my delegation, I offer you my humblest thanks. Never did I imagine that I would meet the gallant and noble lord of Doma himself, nor be welcomed into his magnificent hall.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001370_ASAHI此度は、お招きに預かり、恐悦至極！
ドマの若君、ヒエン様におかれましては…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001380_HIEN<tab>You'll forgive me if we forgo the pleasantries. You say you are come to negotiate peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001380_HIENよい、堅苦しい挨拶は抜きとしよう。
貴殿は、全権大使として和平交渉に来たそうだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001390_HIEN<tab>Unless I am mistaken, such negotiations are typically conducted between <var 1A 02 /var>sovereign<var 1A 01 /var> nations. I was not aware that the Emperor had recognized Doma's sovereignty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001390_HIENわしの思い違いでなければ、和平交渉とは、
戦をしておる国同士が、平和を取り戻すために行うもの。
貴国の皇帝は、ドマを独立国と認めておらぬと理解していたが？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001400_ASAHI<tab>His Radiance has yet to do so, that much is true. Know, however, that he has expressed willingness to cede Doma to her ancestral masters and treat with her as a friend.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001400_ASAHI仰せのとおりです。
ですが、ヴァリス帝にはドマの独立を認め、
友邦として扱う用意があります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001410_ASAHI<tab>Since the days of Emperor Solus, the Empire has aggressively expanded its territory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001410_ASAHIガレマール帝国は、これまで国父たるソル帝の意志のもと、
領土を拡大し続けてきました。
が、その是非をここで論じても仕方がないでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001420_ASAHI<tab>While you may not agree with our founding father's policy of expansion, I believe there is room for discussion on the matter of his lifelong goal─to rid the world of eikons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001420_ASAHIただし、ソル帝が掲げた、
蛮神討滅という国是については、いかがでしょうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001430_ASAHI<tab>Eikons are a blight upon this star. They cannot be suffered to exist. This you know as well as we. In his wisdom, Emperor Varis wishes to explore the possibility of an alliance to combat this common threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001430_ASAHI星の命を蝕む蛮神は、決して許容できない……。
その共通項を以て、手を取り合うことはできないか、
現在、帝位にあるヴァリス帝は、そうお考えなのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001440_ASAHI<tab>On the condition that Doma renounces summoning and pledges to police the Kojin's practice of it, His Radiance would extend the hand of friendship.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001440_ASAHI蛮神召喚には決して手を染めず、
またコウジン族が降ろした蛮神を押さえ込むと確約いただければ、
ドマを友邦として遇するというのが、こちらの提案です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001450_HIEN<tab>Doma has never shown any appetite for summoning. And it should go without saying that we will address any threat to our people, eikon or otherwise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001450_HIENドマの民に、神降ろしの意志はない。
コウジン族が召喚したという蛮神スサノオに関しても、
民の脅威とあらば、言われずとも対処はしてみせよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001460_HIEN<tab>With regard to the Kojin, I must stress that they only resorted to summoning under extreme provocation. When the Ruby Sea was at peace, and their sacred relics safe, they looked not to their kami for protection.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001460_HIENが、コウジン族とて、己が領域を侵される心配がなければ、
蛮神を呼びはせなんだろう。
現に紅玉海が荒れるまで、彼らは神降ろしを行ってこなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001470_HIEN<tab>Yet even now there are certain parties who would destabilize the region with ill-conceived military forays. Unless they alter their course, we cannot hope to be rid of eikons.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001470_HIEN今なお、紅玉海に兵を送り込み騒乱を引き起こすどこかの国が、
考えを改めぬかぎり、完全な封じ込めなどできようはずもない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001480_ASAHI<tab>...Quite. I can but apologize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001480_ASAHI<tab>痛いところを突かれますね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001490_ASAHI<tab>In seeking to eliminate eikons, the Empire creates them. 'Tis an irony among ironies. One with which the people of Eorzea are well acquainted, I am told.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001490_ASAHI蛮神を否定する帝国の行いが、蛮神召喚を引き起こしている。
この皮肉な矛盾については、そちらにおられる、
エオルゼアの方々も、よくご存知のはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed, many summonings are the result of persecution, the weak being driven to call upon the divine for deliverance from the strong. So it was in Ala Mhigo─the bitter fruit of Garlean oppression.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001500_ALPHINAUD確かに……蛮神召喚とは多くの場合、
外圧を受けた弱小勢力が、神に救いを求めることに起因します。
アラミゴにおける蛮神召喚も、帝国軍の行動の結果でありました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001510_ASAHI<tab>A tragic state of affairs. If we are to put an end to summoning once and for all, it shall not be through might, but harmony. Yet we continue to repeat our mistakes, oblivious to the lessons of history.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001510_ASAHI悲しいことです……。
蛮神召喚を止めたいのであれば、
武力と差別ではなく、融和と平等をもたらすべきなのに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001520_ASAHI<tab>My comrades and I would change all that. We Populares have campaigned long and hard for a shift in imperial policy, and at last the Emperor has seen fit to lend us an ear.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001520_ASAHI私たち民衆派は、こうした理念に基づき、
ヴァリス帝に属州政策の転換を進言し続けてきました。
そして、この言葉を皇帝陛下が聞き入れてくださったのです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001530_ASAHI<tab>Alas, there is a faction within Garlemald that would obstruct our every attempt at reform. A collection of pure-blooded Garleans who seek to consolidate their own supremacy: the Optimates.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001530_ASAHI……しかし、生粋のガレアン族を主体とする選民主義者たち、
閥族派が力を持っていることもまた事実です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001540_ASAHI<tab>Lest you wonder, theirs was the hand that loosed our forces on the Confederacy. 'Twas a regrettable incident, one that flies in the face of everything we believe, and I swear to do all in my power to prevent a reoccurrence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001540_ASAHI今回、ドマ代理総督の捜索を名目に、
紅玉海に部隊を派遣したのも、彼ら閥族派でして……。
二度とこのようなことがないよう、私も尽力するつもりです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001550_HIEN<tab>That would be most welcome. But if I may speak plain─if the Empire itself is not of one mind, how can we be certain that any peace we negotiate will be honored?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001550_HIEN是非とも、そうしてもらいたいものだな。
だが、帝国内が対立する二派で分裂しているのであれば、
和平交渉とやらの効力も疑わざるを得ん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001560_ASAHI<tab>I cannot blame you for doubting us. Indeed, I should find it strange if you did not. And so, in the name of building trust, I would like to make a proposal: a prisoner exchange.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001560_ASAHIこちらとしても、簡単には信じていただけないと理解しています。
そこで信頼関係の構築のためにも提案したいのが、捕虜交換です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001570_HIEN<tab>Hm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001570_HIEN<tab>ほぅ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001580_ASAHI<tab>Under Garlean rule, no few Domans were conscripted into the imperial army. We would repatriate them in return for those of ours you captured in the recent conflict.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001580_ASAHIこちら側からは、帝国統治下で徴兵したドマ出身の徴用兵を、
ドマ側からは、先の戦いで捕らえた帝国軍将兵を、
それぞれ引き渡して、交換するのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001590_ASAHI<tab>Naturally, any exchange would include the acting viceroy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001590_ASAHIもちろん、この捕虜交換については、
代理総督であった姉も対象に含まれることになりますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001600_HIEN<tab>Yotsuyu? What makes you think we have her?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001600_HIENヨツユか……。
なぜ、わしらが彼女の身柄を確保していると？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001610_ASAHI<tab>Forgive me, my lord. Was it not your wish to speak plain? Let us not play games. I desire only to work to our mutual benefit.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001610_ASAHIこの件で、化かし合いをするつもりはありませんよ。
交渉はすばやく進めましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001620_ASAHI<tab>The Optimates tried─and failed─to take my sister by force. I would succeed by peaceable means, thereby strengthening my party's hand. 'Twould be a lie to say I would not also be glad of my sister's safe return.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001620_ASAHI武力に頼ろうとする閥族派を黙らせるためにも、
対話による姉の返還を実現したいというのが、私の本音です。
もちろん、弟として姉を想う気持ちもありますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001630_HIEN<tab>A fellow plain-speaker. How refreshing. Very well. Your proposal has merit, but I will need time to consider it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001630_HIEN率直に物を言う男だ。
ならばこちらも本音を言うが、一考に値する提案だとわしも思う。
が、考える時間はもらいたいものだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001640_ASAHI<tab>Of course, my lord. May we remain in Doma until you have come to a decision?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001640_ASAHIもちろんです。
お答えが出るまで、ドマに留まっても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001650_HIEN<tab>You shall be our honored guests.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001650_HIEN認めよう。
交渉の期間中、貴殿らはドマの客人だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001660_HIEN<tab>Yugiri, I leave the ambassador and his retinue in your care. See that they are well looked after.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001660_HIENユウギリ、案内役として同行せよ。
何人たりとも大使殿らに害を為さぬようにな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001670_ASAHI<tab>You have our gratitude, Lord Hien. We shall look forward to your answer.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001670_ASAHIお心遣い感謝いたします、ヒエン様。
では、よき答えがいただけるのをお待ちしていますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001680_ISSE<tab>(-???-)Get back! I'm warning you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001680_ISSE(-？？？？-)や、やめろっ！
妹に手出しをするなっ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001690_ASAHI<tab>Someone's in trouble!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001690_ASAHI聞きましたか？
様子を見に行きましょう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001700_ASAHI<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001700_ASAHI<tab>大丈夫ですか！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001710_ISSE<tab>Aye...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001710_ISSE<tab>あ、ああ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001720_YUGIRI<tab>What do they want with you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001720_YUGIRIイッセ、アザミ……！
何事だ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001730_ISSE<tab>Yugiri!? And you lot, too!? I─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001730_ISSEユウギリ！？
それに、あんたたちは……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001740_ISSE<tab>I don't know. We were returning from the enclave when they came at us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001740_ISSE町人地からの帰りに、
急にあいつらが現れて、襲ってきたんだ。
俺にも、何がなんだか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001750_ALISAIE<tab>It seems they won't go quietly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001750_ALISAIE<tab>どうやら退く気はないようね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001760_ASAHI<tab>And neither will we.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001760_ASAHIここは私も助太刀しますよ。
彼らの安全が最優先ですから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001770_ASAHI<tab>That seems to be the last of them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001770_ASAHI<tab>ふぅ……どうにか凌げましたね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001780_ASAHI<tab>You have nothing to fear, child. You are safe now.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001780_ASAHIもう大丈夫、怖くはありませんよ。
さぁ、お家に帰りなさい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001790_AZAMI<tab>Thank you, sir...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001790_AZAMI<tab>あ、ありがとう、おにいちゃん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001800_ISSE<tab>You saved us again. Thank you. If you're ever passing by our village, look us up. You'll always be welcome.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001800_ISSE本当に助かった、感謝するよ。
よかったら、ナマイ村まで寄ってくれ。
あんたたちなら、いつでも歓迎だから……それじゃ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001810_ASAHI<tab>Thank goodness we arrived when we did.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001810_ASAHI<tab>ふたりが無事でよかった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001820_ALISAIE<tab>Indeed. But what could have prompted the Red Kojin to stray so far from the Ruby Sea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001820_ALISAIEそうね……。
でも、紅玉海を根城にするコウジン族が、
川を遡ってヤンサまで来るなんて……いったいなぜ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001830_ASAHI<tab>I presume these are the sellswords hired by Yotsuyu?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001830_ASAHI甲羅の色からすれば、彼らは姉の……
ヨツユの政策のもとで帝国に雇われた者たちでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001840_ASAHI<tab>If so, the answer is simple: desperation. Bereft of imperial employment, they seek other means to line their coinpurses. Another sad legacy of the Empire's mismanagement.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001840_ASAHIドマ陥落を受けて、帝国という後ろ盾を失った彼らが、
安易な稼ぎを求めて、野盗と化したのかもしれません……。
この事件もまた、帝国による歪みの一例と言えるでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001850_YUGIRI<tab>The Empire to which you have sworn allegiance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001850_YUGIRI<tab>ずいぶんと、ひと事のように話すのだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001860_ASAHI<tab>Must you always be so pointed? If we are to bring about lasting change, we must look beyond narrow allegiances.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001860_ASAHIあまりいじめないでください。
今起きている事象を俯瞰して、広い視野で見なければ、
改革などできるものではないと考えているだけです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001870_ASAHI<tab>You have every right to doubt me, but in time I hope you will come to see that we share a common goal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001870_ASAHI帝国からやってきた私を信じられないという気持ちもわかります。
でも、改革を求める心に嘘偽りはありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001880_ASAHI<tab>You and yours have fought fiercely to change the Empire from without, but if we are to end the cycle of conflict, the Empire must change from within. Am I wrong?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001880_ASAHIあなた方は、戦いにより外から帝国を変えようとした。
そして、ある面でそれは成功しましたが、自由を永続させるには、
内からの変革も必要なはず……違いますか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Not about that. True reform can only come from within.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>内からの変革も必要だ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Empire will never change.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>やはり外から変えるしかない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001890_ASAHI<tab>I knew you would understand. You have witnessed such change firsthand, after all, during your time in Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001890_ASAHIあなたなら、そう言ってくれると思っていました。
数多くの変革を実現してきたあなたなら……ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001900_ASAHI<tab>Never? I wonder, would you have said the same of Ishgard? ...Believe what you will, but I assure you: the Empire <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> change.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001900_ASAHIイシュガルドという国を変えて見せたあなたが、
そんな悲しいことを口にするなんて……。
でも、私は決して諦めませんよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001910_HIEN<tab>I had her brought here in secret while the three of you kept our guest company.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001910_HIENそなたらが大使殿と領内を巡っている間に、
秘密裏に烈士庵から連れてこさせたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001920_HIEN<tab>The world has not been kind to you, it is true. But that does not excuse your sins. You should be at the bottom of the river.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001920_HIEN一度は、その罪ゆえにこの手で斬った相手だ。
怒りと憎しみに故あれども、過去の行いが許されるものでもなし。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001930_HIEN<tab>Yet here you are, the living, breathing proof of my failure. A failure for which I would now make amends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001930_HIEN裁きを下すは主君の務め……。
あと半歩の踏み込みが甘く、仕損じたというなら、
やり遂げるのも、わしの役目よな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001940_YOTSUYU<tab>What did I do? I don't remember.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001940_YOTSUYUあの……わたし、何を……何をしてしまったの？
思い出せない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001950_YOTSUYU<tab>Was it really so terrible? Tell me, please! What did I do!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001950_YOTSUYUでも、何か悪いことをしてしまったんでしょう？
お願い、教えて……知りたいの……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001960_GOSETSU<tab>You speak of sins, my lord, but at whose feet do those sins lie?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001960_GOSETSU罪とは……
罪とは、いずこにあるのでござろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001970_GOSETSU<tab>With the soldiers who committed the crimes, or those who commanded them to do so?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001970_GOSETSU悪事を成した人の身体にこそ罪があるのだとすれば、
手下に命じて罪を犯させた、黒幕を裁くことはできませぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001980_GOSETSU<tab>With both, I would say, for all have a conscience, and all must choose. But with no memory of who she is or what she has done, what sin remains to be cleansed?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001980_GOSETSUでは、悪事を成そうと考えた人の心にこそ、罪があるのか……。
だとすれば、すでに砕け散り、己もわからぬ心に、
罪はありやなしや……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001990_HIEN<tab>You ask that I show mercy?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_001990_HIEN<tab>情が湧いたか、ゴウセツ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002000_GOSETSU<tab>I ask why the heavens saw fit to deny me my rest.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002000_GOSETSU拙者にも、わかりませぬ。
ただ、ようやく得たと思った死に場さえ失った身なれば、
なぜ生き残ったのかと、天命を問いたくもなりましてな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002010_GOSETSU<tab>Why Yotsuyu was spared not only death but the bitter memories of her life.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002010_GOSETSUそして、なぜ天はツユを……ヨツユを生かし、
記憶を奪ったのか……拙者には皆目わかりませぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002020_HIEN<tab>You truly think it the will of the kami...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002020_HIEN<tab>天命、か……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002030_HIEN<tab>If so, her life is not mine to take. It is yours to safeguard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002030_HIENならば、命を天に問うとしよう。
ゴウセツよ、そなたがしばしヨツユの面倒を見よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002040_HIEN<tab>Come the hour of the exchange, if her memories have not returned, she may remain here in Doma to live out her days as Tsuyu.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002040_HIEN捕虜交換のその日までに、記憶が戻らぬようなら、
ツユという名のひとりのドマ人として、新たな人生を歩ませる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002050_HIEN<tab>But if they do, the Garleans shall have their viceroy. Though the people will protest, they will come to accept my decision when they have been reunited with their loved ones.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002050_HIENしかし、記憶が戻ったならば、
代理総督ヨツユとして捕虜の列に加え、帝国に差し出す。
徴兵された者らとの交換ならば、民も納得しよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002060_GOSETSU<tab>Thank you, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002060_GOSETSU<tab>御意……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002070_HIEN<tab>Now, then. I believe we have kept our guest waiting long enough.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002070_HIENゆこう。
大使殿も、そろそろ痺れを切らしているところだろうからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002080_HIEN<tab>Did Gosetsu not seem strange to you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002080_HIEN<tab>気づいておるやもしれんが、ゴウセツの様子がおかしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002081_HIEN<tab>His sympathy for Yotsuyu apart, I mean.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002081_HIEN<tab>ヨツユへの肩入れのことではない……身体のことだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002090_HIEN<tab>I know his powers of endurance only too well, but after all he has suffered, even he should not be on his feet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002090_HIENドマ城崩落に巻き込まれ、九死に一生を得てからの旅路……
無理に無理を重ねた上に、気合ひとつで包み込むような、
生き方をしてきた男だからな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002100_HIEN<tab>He puts on a brave face for our sakes, but it would not surprise me if he lacked the strength to raise his blade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002100_HIEN心配させまいとしているようだが、
どうやら刀すら、まともに握れんようだ。
少し、気にかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002110_HIEN<tab>...Though I suppose if he and Yotsuyu are to enjoy a life of peace and quiet, he will have little use for it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002110_HIENゴウセツが、余生をツユとともに静かに暮らすというなら、
それも悪くないと、わしは思っておる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002120_HIEN<tab>It falls to us to shape that future. One in which he need never again set foot on the battlefield.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002120_HIEN<tab>あの男が、ふたたび戦場に立たずともよい国を造らねばな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002130_HIEN<tab>My apologies. Our deliberations took longer than expected.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002130_HIEN待たせたな、大使殿。
ようやく結論が出たところでな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002140_ASAHI<tab>Think nothing of it. The time afforded me the opportunity to go on a rather rousing excursion through Yanxia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002140_ASAHIいえ、とんでもございません。
おかげで、ヤンサ領内の現状を見学することもでき、
有意義な時間となりました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002150_ASAHI<tab>You have reached a decision, then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002150_ASAHI<tab>……それで、お答えは？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002160_HIEN<tab>We are willing to cooperate with you in combating the eikon threat, and also in the exchange of prisoners. Assuming you accept our conditions, of course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002160_HIENうむ、蛮神対策への協力と捕虜交換の件、ともに受け入れよう。
ただし、条件がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002170_HIEN<tab>As you know, your sister is in our care. Due to certain complications, however, we are hesitant to release her into your custody.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002170_HIEN代理総督ヨツユの件だが、
確かに彼女はわしらが保護しておる。
が、少しばかり問題があってな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002180_ASAHI<tab>Complications?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002180_ASAHI<tab>問題……ですか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002190_HIEN<tab>She was inside Doma Castle when it collapsed. Though she survived, she remembers nothing of her past life─not even her name.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002190_HIENドマ城崩落に巻き込まれながらも、
どうにか生き延びたものの、記憶を失っておってな。
自分の名前すら覚えておらんのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002200_HIEN<tab>To clarify, she is in our care not as a prisoner, but as a vulnerable citizen of Doma.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002200_HIENさきほど保護と言ったのもそれゆえよ。
わしらは、今のところ捕虜としてではなく、
ドマの民のひとりとして扱っておる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002210_ASAHI<tab>Are you saying you refuse to release her?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002210_ASAHI<tab>つまり、捕虜交換の対象とするつもりはない、と？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002220_HIEN<tab>Not at all. If her memory returns before the appointed hour.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002220_HIENそうは言わん。
捕虜交換の日までに記憶が戻れば、
代理総督として、帝国に引き渡そう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002230_ASAHI<tab>And if not, what exactly...? You will accommodate her here in Doma?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002230_ASAHIなるほど……。
もしも記憶が戻らなければ、そのままドマ人として留め置くと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002240_HIEN<tab>Well, I sincerely doubt she will be of any great strategic value to the Empire. She spends her days daydreaming of dango.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002240_HIEN<tab>笑顔で団子を頬張る女を連れ帰ったとて、役には立つまい？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002250_ASAHI<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Dango<var 1A 01 /var>...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002250_ASAHI<tab>だ、団子……ですか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002251_ASAHI<tab>...How dreadful.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002251_ASAHI<tab>あまりに予想外の状況で……困ったな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002260_ASAHI<tab>Very well. In light of our recent...misstep in Sakazuki, it seems only fair that I show you the same understanding you have shown us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002260_ASAHI……わかりました。
こちらも紅玉海に部隊を送り込んでしまった負い目があります。
姉の処遇については、合意しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002270_ASAHI<tab>...Though I do have one, small request. Regardless of Yotsuyu's value to the Empire, she is yet my sister. Before I leave, might you permit me to speak with her in private?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002270_ASAHIただ、彼女は代理総督である以前に、
義理とはいえ、私の姉でもある人です。
帰国する前に、一度、ふたりきりで面会させていただいても？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002280_HIEN<tab>Of course. Perhaps you could even bring her a plate of dango. She would be most pleased.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002280_HIEN無論だ。
団子を持っていってやるといい、喜ぶぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002290_HIEN<tab>Yugiri will see you to her chambers.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002290_HIEN<tab>ユウギリ、大使殿をご案内しろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002300_HIEN<tab>I wish you a safe journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002300_HIEN<tab>では、大使殿、帰路の無事を祈ろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002310_ASAHI<tab>This has been a most enjoyable visit. I look forward to our next meeting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002310_ASAHIありがとうございます。
この度のドマ訪問は、実に有意義なものとなりました。
捕虜交換に際しての再会を、楽しみにしていますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002320_ASAHI<tab>Maxima, would you take the others and see that all is ready for our departure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002320_ASAHI<tab>マキシマ、君たちは一足先に艦に戻って出発準備を……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002330_ASAHI<tab>I simply cannot leave without first giving thanks to the Warrior of Light for accompanying me through Yanxia.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002330_ASAHI最後に……ヤンサ領内での視察に同行してくれた、
英雄殿にお礼をしたいのですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002340_ASAHI<tab>Mark me, savior of the savages. There will be a reckoning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002340_ASAHI蛮族どもの英雄め……。
俺は……俺は、お前を許さない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002350_RESISTANCE<tab>You've nowhere left to run, traitor!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002350_RESISTANCE見つけたぞ！
手間をかけさせてくれたな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002360_ASAHI<tab>Ignorant savages. Killing us will avail you naught.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002360_ASAHIクッ……野蛮人どもめ……！
ここで我らを倒したとて、独立などできるものか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002370_ASAHI<tab>For every imperial you cut down, a thousand more will come. Abandon this foolish endeavor and surrender. You may yet serve our righteous cause.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002370_ASAHIいずれ本国から援軍が来るのだ！
帝国に従うことこそが、唯一正しい道だというのに……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002380_RESISTANCE<tab>How dare you speak of righteousness! You who forsook kith and kin to serve conquerors!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002380_RESISTANCE<tab>ドマ人の誇りを失った犬畜生が、正道を説くとは！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002390_RESISTANCE<tab>Be glad I grant you this mercy.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002390_RESISTANCE<tab>これで終わりにしてやる･……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002400_RESISTANCE<tab>What in the...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002400_RESISTANCE<tab>な、何奴！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002410_RESISTANCE<tab>Reinforcements? ...No─just one. Cut him down!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002410_RESISTANCE援軍……！？
だが、ひとりでなにができよう！
囲んで叩き斬れ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002420_RESISTANCE<tab>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002420_RESISTANCE<tab>ぐおっ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002430_ASAHI<tab>Thank you. Thank you, sir!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002430_ASAHI<tab>た、助かりました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002440_ZENOS<tab>This one is...promising.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002440_ZENOS<tab>これが侍の刀というものか……悪くない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002450_ZENOS<tab>Who remains to offer us resistance?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002450_ZENOS<tab>ほかに抵抗を続ける者は……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002460_ASAHI<tab>A...a host of rebels led by Lord Kaien hold the enclave across the river.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002460_ASAHIえっ……あ、はい……
対岸の町人地にカイエン率いる反逆者の主力部隊が……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002470_ZENOS<tab>Lord Kaien.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002470_ZENOS<tab>その頭目は、強いのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002480_ASAHI<tab>The king of─th-the <var 1A 02 /var>former<var 1A 01 /var> king of Doma, sir. They say he is one of the greatest swordsmen alive.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002480_ASAHIハッ……ドマの元国主にして、
剣豪と名高い人物です……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002490_ZENOS<tab>Is that what they say.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002490_ZENOS<tab>狩りに相応しい獲物であればよいが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002500_ASAHI<tab>Who...was that...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002500_ASAHI<tab>あの方は、いったい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002510_WOUNDEDIMPERIAL<tab>Surely you jest? That was Zenos yae Galvus, legatus of the XIIth─the crown bloody prince! I'd heard he was strong, but that...that was frightening.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002510_WOUNDEDIMPERIAL知らないのか？
第XII軍団を率いる皇太子殿下だ。
戦の天才と聞いていたが、噂に違わぬ豪勇ぶりだったな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002520_ASAHI<tab>That was...Lord Zenos...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002520_ASAHIあれが……あの御方が……
ゼノス様……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002530_ASAHI<tab>Everything you are─your power, even your face─it vexes me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002530_ASAHI<tab>その顔、その力……すべてが忌々しい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002540_ASAHI<tab>Go on. Lash out like the beast you are. At an emissary. And jeopardize the newfound peace between Doma and the Empire.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002540_ASAHIおっと、全権大使の俺に手をだせば、
ドマと帝国の和平は、ご破算……。
それがわからないほど、愚かではないのだろう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002550_ASAHI<tab>My lord was destined to lead us unto a glorious new age. Your light is nothing to his radiance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002550_ASAHI<tab>我が救い主にして、至高の主を傷つけたお前を、絶対に許さない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002551_ASAHI<tab>I will cherish this moment─lock it away within my heart─until the day we meet again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002551_ASAHI<tab>また、会う日を楽しみにしているからな……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002560_HIEN<tab>You look troubled, my friend. Was it something he said?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002560_HIENどうした、顔色が悪いぞ。
大使殿に何か言われでもしたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002570_ALISAIE<tab>Of all the memories to witness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002570_ALISAIE<tab>アサヒの過去を視たというの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002580_YUGIRI<tab>I had my doubts about him, but I would never have guessed he was a disciple of Zenos.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002580_YUGIRIそれにしても、アサヒめ……
胡散臭いとは思っていたが、ゼノスの信奉者だったとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002590_YUGIRI<tab>My lord─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002590_YUGIRI<tab>ヒエン様……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002600_HIEN<tab>Calm yourself, Yugiri. I set no store by him or his enlightened brethren.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002600_HIENみなまで言うな。
わしとて、端から大使殿を信用していたわけでもなし、
帝国内の民衆派とやらに期待もしておらん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002610_HIEN<tab>But if by treating with them there is even the faintest hope we might secure the return of our conscripted brothers and sisters, I must play this game.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002610_HIENただな、ユウギリよ。
わしは徴兵されたドマの民のために、
できるかぎりのことを、してやりたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002620_HIEN<tab>After the way I risked their lives in the rebellion, I owe them that much.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002620_HIEN連れ去られた徴用兵たちは、人質でもあった。
それを知った上で、わしは反乱を起こすと決めたのだからな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002630_YUGIRI<tab>My lord, you bear no blame for their fate.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002630_YUGIRI<tab>それは……ヒエン様に非があるわけでは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002640_HIEN<tab>If not blame then responsibility. They were prisoners and still I chose to fight, knowing they could be executed in retaliation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002640_HIENいいや、非があるかどうかの問題ではない。
わしは確かに主君として、一度は彼らを見捨てたのだ。
処刑もあり得ると知って、反旗を翻した……それは事実であろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002650_HIEN<tab>But now we have a chance to bring them home. If it means bargaining with a monster, so be it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002650_HIENだが、幸いにして、捕虜交換という形で、
彼らを故郷に帰してやれるとなれば……
相手が悪鬼であろうと、取引に応じる理由となろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002660_YUGIRI<tab>My lord...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002660_YUGIRI<tab>ヒエン様…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002670_HIEN<tab>Besides, I think he likes me. Which is more than some can say.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002670_HIENそれにしても、そなたは厄介な男に恨まれたものよな！
あれはしつこいぞ……きっとな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002680_ASAHI<tab>Can you truly remember nothing? Nothing at all?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002680_ASAHI驚いた、本当に何も覚えていないんですね。
姉さん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002690_YOTSUYU<tab>Were we...friends...?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002690_YOTSUYUねえさん……？
あなた、だあれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002700_ASAHI<tab>Yes. We were good friends, you and I. In fact, I've brought you a gift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002700_ASAHIちょっとした昔の知り合いですよ。
そうだ、贈り物がありましてね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002710_ASAHI<tab>I pray that one day soon, as you gaze into that mirror, you will remember the woman staring back at you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002710_ASAHI古い鏡です。
それでも眺めて、自分が何者であったのか、
よくよく考えて思い出してください。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002720_YOTSUYU<tab>It's so pretty...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002720_YOTSUYU<tab>…………きれいな、鏡。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002721_YOTSUYU<tab>Who are you...? Who are you...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002721_YOTSUYU<tab>ねぇ、わたしは……わたしは、だあれ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002730_001_SYSTEM<tab><var 1A 02 /var>nil<var 1A 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002730_001_SYSTEM<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002725_SYSTEM<tab>Meanwhile, in the imperial capital...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002725_SYSTEM<tab>一方 ガレマール帝国・帝都医療施設――

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002730_IMPERIALDOCTOR<tab>How are you feeling, my lord?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002730_IMPERIALDOCTOR<tab>殿下、お加減はいかがですか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002740_ROBEMAN<tab>(-???-)Fine. Now leave me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04200_002740_ROBEMAN(-殿下と呼ばれた男-)…………問題はない。
下がれ。
